text: There Are No Thieves in This Village () is a 1965 Mexican drama movie directed by Alberto Isaac and based on the story by Gabriel García Márquez. It stars Julián Pastor, Rocío Sagaón, Graciela Enríquez, Luis Buñuel, Alfonso Arau, Héctor Ortega. == Other websites == * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Mexican drama movies
title: There Are No Thieves in This Village
